channel.title: Review the Bootstrapped podcast on Apple Podcasts üôè
channel.description:
To those of you who enjoy listening to the Bootstrapped podcast, could I ask you to consider reviewing it on Apple Podcasts?
I think you can only do this from an Apple device.
Here's how to do this from a Mac:
1. Go to https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bootstrapped/id623143926 2. Click on "Listen on Apple Podcasts", which will open the Apple Podcasts app. 3. Click on "Write a Review". It is in the footer area:
![bootstrapped_write_review|640x499](upload://t8AGVJHj6N5A1MX9PXBSMgD1UwH.jpeg)
Thanks!
